tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_sectors; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_sectors AS SELECT s.amp_sector_id, s.parent_sector_id, s.sector_code_official, s.name AS sector_name, getparentsectorid(s.amp_sector_id) AS level0_sector_id, getsectorname(getparentsectorid(s.amp_sector_id)) AS level0_sector_name, NULLIF(getparentsubsectorid(s.amp_sector_id), 0) AS level1_sector_id, getsectorname(getparentsubsectorid(s.amp_sector_id)) AS level1__sector_name, NULLIF(getparentsubsubsectorid(s.amp_sector_id), 0) AS level2_sector_id, getsectorname(getparentsubsubsectorid(s.amp_sector_id)) AS level2__sector_name, ss.amp_sec_scheme_id, ss.sec_scheme_name, acc.name AS typename FROM amp_sector s, amp_sector_scheme ss, amp_classification_config acc WHERE ss.amp_sec_scheme_id = s.amp_sec_scheme_id AND acc.classification_id = ss.amp_sec_scheme_id;
